page.title: 10The Cannington Policeman
page.content: Our local community policeman is P.C Locke. He visited our school to run a course of cycling proficiency. While he was here,our class interviewed him. He said that he had been a policeman for 20 years and worked a 40 hour week.During that time the policemen check property at night, and during the day they go to the scenes of crimes and accidents.Also they visit schools and other people.P.C Locke's area covers Combwich,Cannington, Stolford,Otterhampton and Hinkley Point.In that area the most common crime is "Petty Theft". To join the police_force you have to apply to the police H.Q in Bristol.If accepted training takes 2 years. During that time students do sport ,learn about the law and dealing with people.
